casebody.data:
NEXT ADVISOR CONTINUED, INC.
v.
LENDINGTREE, INC., et al. 391A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2016 Russell F. Sizemore, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Watkins, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mary Cabell Clay, Attorney at Law, Glenn E. Ketner, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Lendingtree, Inc., et al. Christopher G. Smith, Attorney at Law, Susan H. Hargrove, Attorney at Law, Isaac A. Linnartz, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Next Advisor Continued, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of October 2016 by Defendants to Submit Appellate Filings Under Seal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of October 2016."
